nodes.text: H2-FL was a labor droid that was employed by Genetics Laboratory G-1, a genetic research facility on the planet Manaan during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. H2-FL worked on the surface section of the facility, receiving shipments of medical supplies and the like.

H2-FL appears as a repair vendor at the start of the Tactical Flashpoint "Depths of Manaan," which was first added to the massively multiplayer online roleplaying video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.9: Galactic Strongholds Early Access.
